inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a 24-year-old man who has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient reports that he has never been prescribed oral agents for diabetes management.

notes: The patient is a 24-year-old man who has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years. He presents to the emergency room with hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidosis after not taking his insulin for 3 days.
